text: Jinrui wa (motomoto) ichizokudeatta. Sorede arra wa, yogen-sha-tachi o kippo to keikoku no dentatsu-sha to shite noko wa sa reta. Mata kare-ra to tomoni shinri ni yoru keiten o kudashi, sorede, hitobito no ma ni iron no aru shuju no koto ni tsuite saitei sa se rareru. Koshite kare-ra ni meisho ga kudatte iru ni mo kakawarazu,(keiten o) sadzuke rareta-sha-tachi wa, kaette tagai no tame ni arasotta nodearu. Arra wa, kare-ra ga iron o tonaeru shinri ni tsuite, shinko suru mono o tokubetsu no o yurushi de michibika reru. Hontoni arra wa, o kokoronikanau-sha o tadashi michi ni michibika reru
